pages.text: Blood Wood harvested from Blood Trees can be processed into a variety of decorative building blocks. The crimson wood makes for striking architectural accents.

pages.title: Stripped Blood Wood
pages.text: Use an axe on Blood Wood logs to strip the bark, revealing a smoother texture. Works just like stripping vanilla logs.

pages.title: Blood Wood Planks
pages.text: Craft Blood Wood logs into planks (4 planks per log). These planks serve as the base for all other decorative variants.

pages.title: Blood Wood Stairs
pages.text: Craft 6 planks in a stair pattern to create Blood Wood Stairs. Perfect for grand staircases in your blood magic sanctum.

pages.title: Blood Wood Slab
pages.text: Craft 3 planks in a row to create Blood Wood Slabs. Use for flooring, shelves, or decorative trim.

pages.title: Blood Wood Fence
pages.text: Craft planks and sticks in the standard fence pattern. Use to corral your sacrifices or decorate your ritual grounds.

pages.title: Blood Wood Fence Gate
pages.text: Craft sticks and planks in the gate pattern. Allows passage through Blood Wood fences while keeping mobs contained.

pages.title: Building Tips
pages.text: $(bold)Crafting Summary:$()$(li)Log → 4 Planks$(li)6 Planks → 4 Stairs$(li)3 Planks → 6 Slabs$(li)4 Planks + 2 Sticks → 3 Fences$(li)2 Planks + 4 Sticks → 1 Gate$(br2)All Blood Wood blocks work with standard wood recipes and can be used as fuel.$(br2)$(italic)Build your dark empire in crimson.$()
